attributes.additional_details:
For the Government to do the following 5 requests:
1. For the Government to reduce house morgeges by 10%.
2. For the Government to cut the Car prices by 7%.
3. For the Queen to become the Head of the Government as well as Head of State.
4. For the Prince of Wales to be given a new title of Crown Prince and finally
5. For the titles of Duke, Duchess, Earl and Countess to be abolished as they are out dated.
